name: Bulat Sabirov

breadcrumbs.age: 0 years | {n} year old | {n} years old | {n} years old

aboutMeParagraphs: Data engineer with 1+ year of experience and a background in web development. Graduate of Kazan Federal University with a degree in Software Engineering.
Quick to learn new technologies and acquire necessary skills, developing as a T-shaped specialist by deepening expertise in related areas.
Strive to understand not only the technical aspects of tasks but also their practical value.

career.description: Working with the Big Data stack (Hadoop, Spark, SQL, Python) at the intersection of data analysis and automated data collection, preparing data for regulatory reporting and modeling.
Implemented backend (Django) and frontend (React) components of a web application for KFU kindergarten, including basic DevOps tasks.

projects.description: Web application created in the scope of my thesis project.
